definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to carry in the bosom or the sleeve/to wrap, to conceal
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce
to hug/to cherish/within the bosom (of the family)/to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
to have one's heart filled with/(to collide) full on/(of farm animals) heavy with young
to commemorate/to recall fondly/to think of the past
one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
Huairou rural district of Beijing, formerly Huairou county
Huairou rural district of Beijing, formerly Huairou county

sentences.english: The Construction of Chongqing-Huaihua Railway will exert a tremendous influence on the economic development of the area along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 渝懷鐵路修建對沿線地區經濟發展具有重要意義。

sentences.english: She not only can be embosomed but also can be kissed seethingly as much as you like.
sentences.chinese: 不但可以緊擁入懷，還可以盡情親吻。

sentences.english: If you're carrying twins or triplets, you might need to gain more weight.
sentences.chinese: 如果你打算懷雙胞胎或者三胞胎你要增加更多的重量。

sentences.english: I was pregnant when I was drinking herbal tea.
sentences.chinese: 我當時懷寶寶的時候我是喝涼茶。

sentences.english: The manager threw his weight on a bad evaluation of a new employee who he did not like.
sentences.chinese: 經理仗勢欺人對那個他不喜歡的新員工做了懷的評價。

sentences.english: In-calf heifers are admirable for this work.
sentences.chinese: 懷小牛的小母牛最適合這項工作。

sentences.english: Probability of anything happening is inverse ratio to its desirability.
sentences.chinese: 一件事發生的可能懷與它受歡迎的程度成反比。

sentences.english: Let the day perish wherein I was born, and the night in which it was said, There is a man child conceived.
sentences.chinese: 和說懷了男胎的那夜都滅沒。

sentences.english: Wandering on a moonlit night of the killing, harvester knife pregnant think the night wind's whisper.
sentences.chinese: 徘徊在月夜的殺戮，持刀的收割者懷想着夜風的絮語。

sentences.english: Is it true that you are more likely to have severe pregnancy sickness if you are carrying a girl than if it's a boy?
sentences.chinese: 懷女孩比懷男孩更容易孕吐的說法是真的嗎？

sentences.english: The sun for the day; the moon for the night; and you forever.
sentences.chinese: 白日見光，深夜望月，懷你卻永恆。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cryopreservation technique of Dioscorea opposita germplasm resources by vitrification.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究懷山藥種質資源的玻璃化超低溫保存技術。

sentences.english: An Army brat was boasting about his father to a Navy brat.
sentences.chinese: 更深一層說，科比還是一個被寵懷的毛孩子。

sentences.english: This show has a place in television history that we will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 這部劇集正成爲電視史上令人永難忘懷篇章。

sentences.english: Deep down, Kobe is still the spoiled brat.
sentences.chinese: 更深一層說，科比還是一個被寵懷的毛孩子。

sentences.english: I can put up with a lot of things, but the above I can not accept.
sentences.chinese: 好多嘅懷事我可以接受但系嗰啲我接受唔到。

definition: to hug/to cherish/within the bosom (of the family)/to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
